title: Calories in 1/4 Cup Walnuts
meta_description: Learn calories in 1 4 cup walnuts, with a full nutrition breakdown including fats, protein, carbs, and easy tweaks for your diet.
assumptions: Raw, shelled walnuts; 1/4 cup â‰ˆ 28 g (chopped or halved, unsalted).
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by variety, freshness, processing, and measurement; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: 1/4 cup walnuts provides about 183 kcal and 4.3 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in 1/4 cup walnuts?
faqs.a: Approximately 183 kcal for 1/4 cup raw walnuts.

faqs.q: What is the fat content in 1/4 cup walnuts?
faqs.a: About 18.3 g total fat, mostly healthy unsaturated fats.
Yes, 1/4 cup has ~4.3 g protein, good for a snack.

faqs.q: How much fiber in 1/4 cup walnuts?
faqs.a: Around 1.9 g dietary fiber, aiding digestion.
No cholesterol in walnuts; they are plant-based.
